dmca.title: Blogger DMCA Complaint- IRC
dmca.body:
International Rescue Committee
122 East 42nd Street
New York, NY 10168-1289
Tel: 212.551.3000
Fax: 212.551.3179

March 15, 2007

Google, Inc.
Attn: Blogger Legal Support, DMCA Complaints
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway
Mountain View, CA 94043

To Whom It May Concern:

The International Rescue Committee (IRC) wishes to file a notice of infringement regarding misappropriation of IRC content by Orden Bonaria on its blog (http://bonaria-humanitaria.blogspot.com), hosted by Blogger. This is the second (and continuing) instance of this user's misappropriation of IRC materials. (See attached complaint letter and Blogger Legal Support response.)

IRC is an international humanitarian organization, headquartered in New York, with 501(c)(3) status. The material identified below appeared on IRC blogs on IRC's website. The materials were authored by IRC employees and describe IRC programs. We appreciate your efforts to stop this misappropriation and misrepresentation of IRC's works. IRC reserves the right to pursue any and all legal remedies directly against Orden Banaria for the unlawful use of IRC's materials.

1-2 IRC copyrighted work that has been infringed upon and infringing material.

a. IRC content: http://www.ircblog.org/archives/1930_1321467629/100400 - blog post by IRC communications offers Peter Biro

Infringing content: http://bonaria-humanitaria.blogspot.com/2007/03/order-bonaria-in-sund.html - attributed to "Orden Bonaria at 3:19 AM"

b. IRC content: http://www.theirc.org/where/the-irc-in-central-african.html - Infringing content from stories linked from this page

Infringing content: http://bonaria-humanitaria.blogspot.com/2007/02/order-bonaria-in-candango.html

c. IRC content: http://ircblog.org/archives/1930_1321457639/207984 
Text from IRC, Video doesn't appear to be ours.

Infringing content: http://bonaria-humanitaria.blogspot.com/2007/02/child-friendly-spaces.html

d. IRC content: http://www.theirc.org/what/iraqi-refugees.html
One of the stories, and photo, linked from the above URL is used in infringing content.

Infringing content: http://bonaria-humanitaria.blogspot.com/2007/02/sovereign-order-bonaria-examines-plight.html

e. IRC content: http://www.theirc.org/what/iraqi-refugees.html
One of the stories linked from the above URL is used in infringing content.

Infringing content: http://bonaria-humanitaria.blogspot.com/2007/02/with-iraqi-refugees-in-jordan.html

f. IRC content: http://ircblog.rg/archives/1930_1321467639/211361
Photo and text property of IRC; blog posting by IRC Communications Officer, Emily Holland

Infringing content: http://bonaria-humanitaria.blogspot.com/2007/02/darfur-hamidi-camp.html
-Attributed to "Orden Bonaria at 2:40 AM"

3. Contact Information

Carrie A. Simon, General Counsel
International Rescue Committee
122 East 42nd Street
New York, NY 10168
Ph. 212 551 2729
Carrie.Simon@theirc.org

4. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, International Rescue Committee, its agent, or the law.

5. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am authorized to act on behalf of IRC, the owner of an exclusive right that has been infringed.

Sincerely,

Carrie A. Simon
General Counsel

Cc: Kathleen Sands, Web Director
